pkgmetadata.longdescription: E-Statistics for Seurat Objects // R version of 'scperturb' tool for single-cell perturbation analysis. Contains wrappers for performing E-statistics for Seurat objects. More details on the method can be found in Peidli et al. (2023) doi:10.1101/2022.08.20.504663 and in Szkely and Rizzo (2004).
